title: Song of the Thin Man (Powell, Loy) [1947] Eng, Fr, It + 5 subs
description:
Please seed!

The Thin Man Collection
Dvd-box containing 7 dvds
Separate uploads

1. The Thin Man [1934]
2. After the Thin Man [1936]
3. Another Thin Man [1939]
4. Shadow of the Thin Man [1941]
5. The Thin Man Goes Home [1945]
6. Song of the Thin Man [1947]

7. Alias Nick and Nora - documentary
   - Myrna Loy - So Nice to Come Home to [TV 1991]
   - William Powell: A True Gentleman [Video 2005]

Art work for the box and the two thin-packs in the collection included with
film one.
Each film comes with art work for the DVD and I have also included a separate
cover for each film. Theese covers have the same front image as the thumb-nail
pictures on the box backside. (Information on audio and subs on theese covers
does not match this release).


Song of the Thin Man [1947]

Nick, Nora, and Nick Jr. investigate the murder of a band leader in New York. 


Starring: William Powell, Myrna Loy, Asta and Keenan Wynn.
          Dean Stockwell as Nick Charles Jr.
Director: Edward Buzzell.


Video: MPEG2PAL 4:3 720x576

Audio: English, French and Italian Dolby AC-3/1
